columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EVENT_START_DTTM
columns.description: Start instant (date and time) for the encounter.

columns.name: EVENT_END_DTTM
columns.description: End instant (date and time) for the encounter.

columns.name: EVENT_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Unique identifier for the encounter in which the document was edited on the remote system. This is either a contact serial number (CSN) or, if using IntraConnect, a Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: EVENT_ENC_MOOD
columns.description: Mood code of the remote encounter.

columns.name: EVENT_ENC_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: Free text name of the remote encounter type.

columns.name: EVENT_ENC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Encounter type of the contact at the remote organization.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.description: Key for use by other related event groups.

columns.name: EVENT_LOC_NAME
columns.description: Free text of the location name associated with the patient's encounter on the remote system.

columns.name: EVENT_LOC_IDENT
columns.description: The unique ID of the location on the remote system where the patient's encounter occurred.

columns.name: EVENT_ED_TO_INP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this encounter was upgraded from ED to Inpatient.  Y indicates that the encounter was upgraded from ED to Inpatient.  N indicates an inpatient encounter that was not upgraded from ED.  Null indicates either a non-inpatient encounter or an encounter for which this information is not available.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EVENT_MED_REV_YN

columns.name: EVENT_LOS_CPT
columns.description: This item stores the level of service CPT (Current Procedure Terminology) code for where the encounter took place.

columns.name: EVENT_RCVD_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the last received instant.

columns.name: EVENT_SET_ID
columns.description: Document set ID that represents a common identifier across all document revisions.

columns.name: EVENT_DUP_EPT_CSN
columns.description: The internal patient contact serial number (CSN) that is a duplicate of this external encounter.

columns.name: EVENT_LST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last update instant of the event in UTC.

columns.name: EVENT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The note (HNO) ID related to this encounter.

columns.name: EVENT_ADDR_STREET
columns.description: Street address of the place where the event occurred.

columns.name: EVENT_ADDR_CITY
columns.description: The city where the event occurred.

columns.name: EVENT_ADDR_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state where the event occurred.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EVENT_ADDR_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The county where the event occurred.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EVENT_TZ_OFFSET
columns.description: Contains the time zone offset of this encounter in hours

columns.name: EVENT_REL_DOC
columns.description: Stores ID of the document that contains a given encounter (event) in its encounter section.

columns.name: RCVD_EVENT_ID
columns.description: Stores the encounter reference ID received in an external document when reference IDs are not trusted.

columns.name: EVENT_DATA_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the data comes from the encompassingEncounter section or an encounter section of a CDA document, or from the event list. By default (i.e. when this value is blank) the data is assumed to come from the encounter section. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Encompassing Encounter


Event List

columns.name: REL_DOC_RCVD_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last received instant of the related document.

columns.name: EVENT_ENC_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the status of the encounter, if cancelled


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Normal


Aborted


Active


Cancelled


Completed


Held


New


Suspended


Nullified


Obsolete

columns.name: EVENT_HOSP_ADMSN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the encounter is a hospital admission.  Y indicates that the encounter is a hospital admission. N indicates that the encounter is not a hospital admission. NULL indicates an encounter for which this information is not available.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EVENT_MED_REV_YN

columns.name: EVENT_HOV_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the encounter is a hospital outpatient visit.  Y indicates that the encounter is a hospital outpatient visit. N indicates that the encounter is not a hospital outpatient visit. NULL indicates an encounter for which this information is not available.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EVENT_MED_REV_YN

columns.name: EVENT_OUTPAT_F2F_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the encounter is an outpatient face-to-face visit.  Y indicates that the encounter is an outpatient face-to-face visit. N indicates that the encounter is not an outpatient face-to-face visit. NULL indicates an encounter for which this information is not available.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EVENT_MED_REV_YN

columns.name: EVENT_ACUITY_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the received acuity level for an encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EVENT_FILTER_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason why an external encounter should be filtered from the composite record


May contain organization-specific values: No

Claim Derivation: Procedure Code Inclusion/Exclusion List


Claim Derivation: Missing Provider

columns.name: EVENT_ADMISSION_RSN
columns.description: The reason for the admission based on HL7v2 tables

columns.name: EVENT_FAC_NPI
columns.description: Stores the facility NPI where the event occurred.

columns.name: EVENT_FAC_TIN
columns.description: Stores the facility TIN where the event occurred.

columns.name: DOC_CREATE_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Holds the creation instant of the document as returned by the query response header. This is distinct from I DXR 172, which is the creation instant as returned by metadata within the received document.

columns.name: EVENT_ENC_IDENT
columns.description: The unique identifier for this encounter as received on the remote system. This is only populated for documents received from non-Epic organizations.

columns.name: EVENT_ADMSN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Admission type of the encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accident


Elective


Emergency


Labor and Delivery


Newborn (Birth in healthcare facility)


Routine


Urgent

columns.name: EVENT_ADMIT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Admit source of the encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Physician referral


Clinic referral


HMO referral


Transfer from a hospital


Transfer from a skilled nursing facility


Transfer from another health care facility


Emergency room


Court/law enforcement


Information not available

columns.name: EVENT_TITLE
columns.description: Title of a document associated with an event.

columns.name: EXPECT_LEN_OF_STAY
columns.description: The expected length of the stay in days.

columns.name: EXPECT_DISCH_DATE
columns.description: Expected discharge date for the encounter

columns.name: EXPECT_DISCH_TM
columns.description: Expected discharge time for the encounter

columns.name: EVENT_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Authorization Number of the encounter

columns.name: EVENT_PRE_CERT_NUM
columns.description: Pre-admit Certification Number of the encounter
